Hello!
I'm trying to make a workflow that does: When a meeting is created, change the phase from one to another (only if the phase was the first one).
Is it possible with HubSpot?
Thanks!
With the automated meeting reminder email, is there any way to edit it to include the google meet link (the initial email includes it)
Thanks Carter. I'm going to take a crack at it and will let you know. Appreciate the help.
Sounds good let me know how it goes

No, I don’t think you can do that. I’ve tried in the past.

You could build your own meeting reminders with automation.
Is the phase in the contact record or in the meeting activity?
An automation will work, but i was hoping it was something simple before I started creating a workaround.
I agree Evan. The email customization option is soooo limited!
Which doesn’t include the meeting url.

in a custom workflow action's labels, is it possible to use hubl variables or any other way to get the portal ID as a variable? I am adding help language to a workflow action and I want to link elsewhere in HubSpot, but the portal ID is in the URL. This action would be installed into any portal, so the portal id needs to be dynamically determined.
I am trying to dynamically use the portal Id within the `actionDescription`  label
Well, I was totally guessing, but I discovered that you can use `{portalId}` in the actionDescription and it will dynamically replace that value with the portal Id where it installed
Didn't know you could do that

The phase is in the deal
The meeting activity and the contact should be associated to the deal
